sources.title: Hell Boats (1970) James Franciscus
sources.description: War drama. In 1942, the Allies use a ruse to fight the German Navy. During World War II, the commander of the British fleet receives the seemingly hopeless mission of destroying a German torpedo boat base in Sicily from Malta. .

metadata.Plot: An American commander, serving under the British Royal Navy in 1942, is assigned to blockade the island of Malta and told to formulate a plan to destroy the Nazi arsenal in Sicily.
metadata.Writer: Anthony Spinner, Donald Ford, Derek Ford
metadata.Actors: James Franciscus, Elizabeth Shepherd, Ronald Allen
